meanings.definition: A person who competes in downhill skiing races.
meanings.sent1: The downhillers raced down the snowy slope with skill.
meanings.sent2: Many downhillers gathered at the mountain for the skiing competition.
meanings.sent3: The downhillers wore colorful suits as they zoomed down the hill.
meanings.sent4: Watching the downhillers glide effortlessly down the mountain was like witnessing poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd echoed as the downhillers crossed the finish line.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in activities that involve descending a slope or hill.
meanings.sent1: The group of downhillers hiked up the hill before starting their descent.
meanings.sent2: Downhillers enjoy the thrill of going down steep slopes on their bikes.
meanings.sent3: The downhillers giggled as they slid down the hill on their sleds.
meanings.sent4: The children pretended to be downhillers racing down the imaginary mountain.
meanings.sent5: The downhillers felt the wind in their faces as they sped down the slope.
